content: My name is Amatya Sharma, aka, Aay. I am a 5th year Dual Degree (BTech+MTech) student at Computer Science and Engineering Department, Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Kharagpur. I am a coffee aficionado straight from the himalayas (Hamirpur, Himachal Pradesh). I am "(current-year) modulo 100" years old i.e. 21 years old in 2021.Currently Living at: HamirpurMar. 2020 - Present --Previous Stay: KharagpurJul. 2017 - Mar. 2020 --Relationship Status: Committed to Caffeine The high/rash cyclist at IIT Kgp The guy binging coffee at IISc The one tweeting maths conjectures The silent serious guy at DAV Hmr The alien in the jungles of Hamirpur The momo-binger near NITH or TechM --
summary: My name is Amatya Sharma, aka, Aay. I am a 5th year Dual Degree (BTech+MTech) student at Computer Science and Engineering Department, Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Kharagpur. I am a coffee aficionado straight from the himalayas (Hamirpur, Himachal Pradesh).
title: Amatya Sharma

content: KCRoaster’s Marvahulla Cappuccino by me. Cocoa Caramel taste and a medium dark espresso roast from 5000 Ft. plants from Nilgiris, India. KCRoasters have been one of my top blends of 2021.
title: Sharmas Hamirpur

content: Blue Tokai’s Bold Blend Cold brew by me. A dark roast perfect for to enjoy a robust kick üèÉ in the coffee, low acidic with a nutty flavour profile with notes of dark chocolate and roasted nuts. Perfect for milky üç∂ drinks (and that’s me pouring it in the pic).
title: Sharmas Hamirpur

content: Ice Coffee by McDonalds Goa. Minimal coffee strenght and frozen ‚ùÑÔ∏è like a naked a*s in himalayas.

content: Cold Coffee by Thalasa Restaurant, Goa. Less sweet (as I like) but less acidic, mild coffee flavour of the cold brew. üç∂

content: Nescafe Classic Cappuccino by me. Nescafe is always a go-to and comfy coffee to opt for. Takes the least of time to prepare.

content: Michief Cappuccino by Cafe Coffee Day. A sweet at spicy coffee, where there is a combination of chocolate and cinnamon with notes of some chilli in it as well.
title: CCD IITKgp

content: Classic Cappuccino by Cafe Coffee Day. A bold yet sweet coffee, CCD’s a safe choice to rely on.
title: CCD IITKgp

content: Recharge Cappuccino by Cafe Coffee Day. One of the unique new flavours of cappuccino by CCD.

content: Unwind Cappuccino by Cafe Coffee Day. An earthy, traditional flavours of ginger and turmeric, damn soothing üòÑ.

content: Aztec Cappuccino by Cafe Coffee Day. A delightful international gourment blend that includes a double shot of espresso brewed from a blend of imported coffee beans topped with steamed and foamed milk.

content: Crush Cappuccino by Cafe Coffee Day. A tangerine flavour, quite new to my coffee taste buds.
